1. Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT)

    Cognitive Processing Therapy (CPT): Helps individuals identify and change unhelpful thought patterns related to the trauma.
    Prolonged Exposure Therapy (PE): Involves gradually confronting trauma-related memories, feelings, and situations to reduce their power.                                                                   -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  2. Eye Movement Desensitization and Reprocessing (EMDR)
Combines therapy with guided eye movements to help individuals process traumatic memories and reduce their emotional intensity.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     3. Medication
Selective Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitors (SSRIs): Antidepressants like sertraline (Zoloft) and paroxetine (Paxil) are often prescribed for PTSD to reduce symptoms.
 Prazosin: Sometimes used to help reduce nightmares and improve sleep in people with PTSD.                                                                                                                                             -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 4.  Trauma-Focused   Therapy
This approach involves a focus specifically on the traumatic event, helping individuals work through emotions and memories related to their trauma.                              --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------5. Group Therapy
Support groups where individuals with PTSD share experiences can help reduce isolation and offer mutual support.
